item.title: My apple hater userbar
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

This is MoparScape and in the words of a moderator “We do not spoonfeed.” If you can’t take the CC like I did when I first started posting sigs and tutorials here, don’t post at all. We’re trying to make you better and you just think it’s flame. It’s constructive criticism, we’re trying to make you better. I learned it the hard way and you should too, I’m still not taking CC very good, but I learned, didn’t I?

Read full topic
